DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : The prevalence childhood obesity increase rapidly develop country . The aim study determine effect exercise train family-based behavioral treatment ( FBBT ) , either individual group set , pre-pubertal child mother . Methods : This 6-month randomized control trial ( RCT ) include 75 pre-pubertal obese child ( age 8-11 year ) randomly assign Intervention ( I , n=50 ) Control group ( C , n=25 ) . The intervention consist family-based behavioural therapy group ( 1 session/week dietician psychologist ) individual setting ( paediatrician dietician 1x/month ) . The intervention include exercise training session twice week ( 60 minute ) . Measures include : body mass index ( BMI ) , waist hip circumference ; whole body abdominal fat mass DXA ; rest ambulatory blood pressure ; arterial intima-media thickness vascular reactivity ( flow-mediated dilation ) use high resolution ultrasound ; arterial stiffness tonometry applanation ; cardiorespiratory fitness treadmill test ; physical activity ; fast lipid , glucose , insulin , C-reactive protein level ; health-related quality life psychological health use standardized questionnaire semi-structured interview . Measures complete child mother baseline 6 month post-randomization .
